Package mindustry.ctype

Class UnlockableContent

java.lang.Object
mindustry.ctype.Content
mindustry.ctype.MappableContent
mindustry.ctype.UnlockableContent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable, java.lang.Comparable<Content>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block, Item, Liquid, Planet, SectorPreset, StatusEffect, UnitType, Weather
public abstract class UnlockableContent
extends MappableContent
Base interface for an unlockable content type.

  • Field Details

    • stats

      public Stats stats
      Stat storage for this content. Initialized on demand.

    • localizedName

      public java.lang.String localizedName
      Localized, formal name. Never null. Set to internal name if not found in bundle.

    • description

      @Nullable public java.lang.String description
      Localized description & details. May be null.

    • details

      @Nullable public java.lang.String details
      Localized description & details. May be null.

    • alwaysUnlocked

      public boolean alwaysUnlocked
      Whether this content is always unlocked in the tech tree.

    • inlineDescription

      public boolean inlineDescription
      Whether to show the description in the research dialog preview.

    • iconId

      public int iconId
      Special logic icon ID.

    • cicons

      protected TextureRegion[] cicons
      Icons by Cicon ID.

    • unlocked

      protected boolean unlocked
      Unlock state. Loaded from settings. Do not modify outside of the constructor.

    • UnlockableContent

      public UnlockableContent​(java.lang.String name)

  • Method Details

    • node

      @Nullable public TechTree.TechNode node()
      Returns:
      the tech node for this content. may be null.

    • displayDescription

      public java.lang.String displayDescription()

    • checkStats

      public void checkStats()
      Checks stat initialization state. Call before displaying stats.

    • setStats

      public void setStats()
      Initializes stats on demand. Should only be called once. Only called before something is displayed.

    • createIcons

      public void createIcons​(MultiPacker packer)
      Generate any special icons for this content. Called asynchronously.

    • researchRequirements

      public ItemStack[] researchRequirements()
      Returns:
      items needed to research this content

    • emoji

      public java.lang.String emoji()

    • icon

      public TextureRegion icon​(Cicon icon)
      Returns a specific content icon, or the region {contentType}-{name} if not found.

    • prefDatabaseIcon

      public Cicon prefDatabaseIcon()

    • getDependencies

      public void getDependencies​(Cons<UnlockableContent> cons)
      Iterates through any implicit dependencies of this content. For blocks, this would be the items required to build it.

    • display

      public void display​(Table table)
      This should show all necessary info about this content in the specified table.

    • onUnlock

      public void onUnlock()
      Called when this content is unlocked. Use this to unlock other related content.

    • isHidden

      public boolean isHidden()
      Whether this content is always hidden in the content database dialog.

    • showUnlock

      public boolean showUnlock()
      Returns:
      whether to show a notification toast when this is unlocked

    • unlock

      public void unlock()
      Makes this piece of content unlocked; if it already unlocked, nothing happens.

    • quietUnlock

      public void quietUnlock()
      Unlocks this content, but does not fire any events.

    • unlocked

      public boolean unlocked()

    • clearUnlock

      public void clearUnlock()
      Locks this content again.

    • unlockedNow

      public boolean unlockedNow()
      Returns:
      whether this content is unlocked, or the player is in a custom (non-campaign) game.

    • locked

      public boolean locked()
